name: Northern Skunk
description: Northern Skunk is a hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Northern Lights and Super Skunk. Northern Skunk is 19% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for beginner cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us Northern Skunk effects include feeling happy, euphoric, and uplifted. Medical marijuana patients often choose Northern Skunk when dealing with symptoms associated with depression, stress, and pain. Originally bred by an unknown breeder, Northern Skunk features flavors like skunk, pungent, and pepper. The dominant terpene of this strain is myrcene.
